attributes.action: Petition the DCMS to put the Isles Of Wonder London 2012 soundtrack on Spotify.
attributes.background:
The UK is having a tough time, and one thing that would make everyone happy again is to relive the London 2012 Olympic opening ceremony. Putting the soundtrack up on Spotify will do this. 

The royalties that the government would earn from this can also be used to help fund the NHS or something.
